title: Briget's Weapons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Briget's Weapons is a sword shop located in the south-east corner of Shayzien. Accessing it requires a player to have 20% Shayzien favour. The shop is run by Briget.

content:
Briget's Weapons
Released12 May 2016 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationShayzien
OwnerBriget
SpecialtySword shop
Location

Briget's Weapons is a sword shop located in the south-east corner of Shayzien. Accessing it requires a player to have 20% Shayzien favour. The shop is run by Briget.
